FuncDef: This command specifies the next header to match. The protocol type such as TCP, UDP or OSPF is identified by its respective protocol number. Well-known protocol numbers include ICMP(1), TCP(6), UDP(17). IPv6 Extension headers are identified by the next header IPv6 numbers as per RFC2460. This command only applies to the 7750 SR and 7950 XRS.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies for IPv4 MAF the IP protocol field, and for IPv6 the next header type to be used in the match criteria for this Management Access Filter Entry.
